name: Sibers
tag_list: software, development, programming, outsourcing, it, mobile, web, desktop, offshore
overview:
Sibers is an Information Technology Outsourcing company that is headquartered in Akademgorodok, Silicon Taiga, Russia.

Currently, Sibers is one of the largest IT outsourcing companies in Russia with development offices located in Akademgorodok, Novosibirsk, Barnaul, and Bishkek (Kyrgyzstan) and a total of 140 employees as of 2011. Sibers also has representatives located in Australia, Germany, and the United States.

The company operates under its registered trademark name HireRussians as well.

Sibers offers services in the following areas of information technology outsourcing: software research, development, and testing of applications for web, desktop and mobile platforms.

Industry awards:

  • IAOP Top 100
  • Microsoft Certified Partner
  • OISV Contributing Member

Professional certifications:

  • Zend Certified Engineer (ZCE) certification
  • Microsoft Certified Professional program
  • Linux Professional Institute Certification (LPIC)
  • Sun Certified Programmer certification
